name: ultosc
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Fetches the Ultimate Oscillator (ULTOSC) data for a given financial instrument using the Twelve Data API. The Ultimate Oscillator takes into account three different time periods to enhance the quality of overbought and oversold signals.

symbol.description: Instrument symbol, can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., 'AAPL', 'EUR/USD', 'ETH/BTC').

interval.description: Interval between two consecutive points in the time series. Supported values are '1min', '5min', '15min', '30min', '45min', '1h', '2h', '4h', '1day', '1week', and '1month'.

time_period_1.description: First time period for the oscillator calculation. Defaults to 7.

time_period_2.description: Second time period for the oscillator calculation. Defaults to 14.

format.description: Output format, either 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Defaults to 'json'.

time_period_3.description: Third time period for the oscillator calculation. Defaults to 28.

outputsize.description: Default `30` when no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum
